titles.title: Honoring and commending The George Washington University in Washington, D.C., for hosting the 2008 Science Olympiad National Tournament.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
4/10/2008--Introduced.
Commends The George Washington University for hosting the 2008 Science Olympiad National Tournament for teams of students from middle schools and high schools across the nation.
